featured.text: However, in response to the 29 of this event, the concepts of fostering peace and harmony do not have to be confined to one day a year.
I. Irene Fostering empathy…By seeing an animal up close, the public could be encouraged to be more sensitive and compassionate to a species that is facing extinction in the wild.

definition.zh_def: 促進，培養，撫養（通常指非親生的孩子）
definition.en_def: To encourage the development or growth of something; to take care of a child that is not one's own.
definition.example: They decided to foster a child in need.
